Package com.scvngr.levelup.core.net

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    AccessTokenRetriever
    Interface for a class that can be used to retrieve the currently logged in User's AccessToken.
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    AbstractRequest
    Object which represents an HTTP request.
    AbstractResponse<T>
    Object which represents an HTTP response.
    BufferedRequest
    Object which represents an HTTP request.
    BufferedResponse
    An AbstractResponse that uses a buffered interface where the response data is buffered in memory.
    LevelUpConnection
    Class for interacting with the LevelUp web service API.
    LevelUpRequest
    Class representing a request to the LevelUp web service using the API v14 and above standards.
    LevelUpRequestWithCurrentUser
    LevelUpRequest subclass that formats the ID of the current User into the request URL at request time.
    LevelUpResponse
    Class to encompass a response from the LevelUp Web Service.
    LevelUpV13Request Deprecated
    LevelUpV13RequestWithCurrentUser Deprecated
    NetworkConnection
    Utility class for performing network operations.
    StreamingResponse
    An AbstractResponse that uses a streaming interface where the response data is read from a stream.
  • Enum Summary 
    Enum Description
    HttpMethod
    Enum for HTTP method types.
    LevelUpStatus
    Enum for translating generic network responses (and exceptions) into more broad categories for use within client apps.
  • Exception Summary 
    Exception Description
    AbstractRequest.BadRequestException
    Exception that is thrown if a request is invalid at the time it it sent.
